title: Ebro In The Morning - Meg Thee Graduate  + New DMX Documentary with Chris Frierson
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 12/13.

Ebro and the crew interview Director Chris Frierson about his new DMX documentary on HBO Max (18), the crew talks home-cooked meals with callers (45), Gurus give their advice (1:00) and Laura Stylez brings the 411 with Flashing Lights about Meg Thee Stallion's graduation. 

Click here to learn about the Hot 97 - Securing the Future initiative. 

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
